author: Play On Tabletop
description:
Playing regularly with a group of friends can introduce some amazing narratives in your games and sometimes inspire some fun armies and conversions.  We show off some here today. 

Redclaw Gaming: https://www.redclawgaming.com

In June Redclaw gaming is hosting a painting contest at gamecon Canada.  You can enter here: da/events/game-con-canada-powered-by-telus-114577?sort=RECOMMENDED&COL=14121&A=L

MB014ZLWYW5NHIP
MB01LDU0QPNRHXJ
title: How to approach playing narrative games. We show off three narrative focused armies.
